image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
image_analysis.quantity: Pack of 2 (1 KG each, total 2 KG)
key_features: Pair of 1 KG dumbbells, total 2 KG, for home workouts and fitness training
Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Non-slip neoprene surface for a secure, comfortable grip
Printed weight number on each end cap for easy identification
Color-coded pink design to quickly distinguish weight
Hexagonal ends prevent the dumbbells from rolling away
Compact size suitable for home gym, fitness classes, or office workouts
Visible KAKSS branding on end caps for clear brand identification
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength training, toning, and resistance exercises in home gyms, fitness classes, or personal workout spaces.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, fitness enthusiasts, and people seeking light hand weights for toning and resistance training.
image_analysis.ai_description: Pair of pink KAKSS neoprene dumbbells, each 1 KG, with hexagonal ends and clear weight markings. The cast-iron core and non-slip neoprene coating offer a secure grip and prevent rolling, ideal for compact home or studio workouts.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Non-slip neoprene coating provides a secure, comfortable grip
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Reduces the chance of the dumbbells slipping from sweaty hands, making workouts safer and more controlled.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Hexagonal shape keeps dumbbells from rolling
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Prevents weights from moving across the floor, protecting surfaces and keeping the workout area organized.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Printed weight markings and color-coded pink design
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Allows users to quickly identify the correct weight, saving time during circuits or multi-weight routines.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Compact 1 KG pair suitable for light strength and toning
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Ideal for beginners or rehabilitation exercises, offering manageable resistance without taking up much space.
